resources:
Seven Swipe up to begin (after 5 sec. break) … 5 seconds break before first exersise … //Menu Settings Settings | Help | About License Help Changelog About the app Sound settings See what\'s new … App is licensed under GPL3 Learn about the swipe gestures … TTS Do you want to hear voice commands? Beep Do you want to hear a short \"Beep\" after each exercise? //Snackbar A short Break … … let\'s start again! Done! That\'s the first exercise. That\'s the last exercise. Please change from right to left side. //Titles 1. Exercise - Jumping jacks 2. Exercise - Wall sit 3. Exercise - Push ups 4. Exercise - Abdominal crunch 5. Exercise - Step up on chair 6. Exercise - Squat 7. Exercise - Tricepts on chair 8. Exercise - Plank 9. Exercise - High knees running 10. Exercise - Lunge 11. Exercise - Push up with rotation 12. Exercise - Side plank right 12. Exercise - Side plank left Break - then: Wall sit Break - then: Push ups" Break - then: Abdominal crunch Break - then: Step up on chair Break - then: Squat Break - then: Tricepts on chair" Break - then: Plank Break - then: High knees running Break - then: Lunge Break - then: Push up with rotation Break - then: Side plank right Break - please change sides //License Dialog OK Copyright © 2016 by scoute-dich Contributors:

The pictures from the workout can be found on the Blog of \"C. Gilbert\" (http://almostfearless.com/the-21-minute-workout-or-7-minutes-if-youre-really-fit). Thanks to her for the permission to use them in the app. //Changelog Dialog For more informations visit the project site on github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/Sieben

v1.6.1:
• fixed broken link

v1.6:
• removed fab-button
• added audio settings
• splited last exercise in two parts
• break before first exercise

v1.5:
• text to speech support
• countdown pause and resume support
• code clean up

v1.4:
• set screen orientation to portrait
• fixed project-link

v1.3.1:
• added Japanese translation

v1.3:
• added swipe function (see help dialog)
• keep screen awake
• new dialogs (help/changelog)

v1.2:
• changed default language to english

v1.1:
• better integration of snackbar

v1.0:
• first release //Help Dialog Swipe on left: switch to next exercise

Swipe on right: switch to previous exercise

Swipe on bottom: make a break

Swipe on top: restart actual exercise
